text: @konservativer Twitterer: "Energy crisis in Europe: Who has the priciest electricity and gas? 🤔 After Russia's invasion of Ukraine, prices soared, but are now declining. 💡🇪🇺 But which countries have the highest and lowest prices? 🤷‍♂️💰 And how much have electricity and natural gas prices increased since February 2022? 📈🔥
